objects.specification: A broad flat floor plane covering the entire classroom area, featuring a realistic hardwood plank texture in rich earthy brown tones, with subtle grain and matte finish for a warm, natural prehistoric ambiance.
A vertical front wall with smooth plaster finish painted in a warm tan earthy tone, providing a neutral backdrop for teaching aids and decorations.
A rear wall with the same plaster finish and earthy tan color, serving as a canvas for dinosaur posters and educational murals without visual clutter.
A side wall painted in muted olive-green with a smooth matte finish, evoking a prehistoric jungle atmosphere.
A side wall in complementary earthy olive-green, featuring a smooth matte texture and ready to display windows and wall-mounted items.
